action_list.description: System action for installing an application

attrs.script:
yum -y install epel-release
yum -y install nginx
systemctl start nginx
systemctl enable nginx
yum -y install git

mkdir -p /var/www/projects/uptick
yum -y update
cd /var/www/projects/uptick
git clone https://github.com/mjastad/uptick.git
mkdir -p /var/www/html

cp /var/www/projects/uptick/uptick/index.html /var/www/html/index.html
cp -R /var/www/projects/uptick/uptick/fonts/ /var/www/html/fonts
cp -R /var/www/projects/uptick/uptick/css/ /var/www/html/css
cp -R /var/www/projects/uptick/uptick/images/	/var/www/html/images
mkdir -p /var/www/html/js/
cp /var/www/projects/uptick/uptick/js/data.js /var/www/html/js/data.js

attrs.script:
yum -y install epel-release
yum -y install nginx
systemctl start nginx
systemctl enable nginx
yum -y install git

mkdir -p /var/www/projects/uptick
yum -y update
cd /var/www/projects/uptick
git clone https://github.com/mjastad/uptick.git
mkdir -p /var/www/html

cp /var/www/projects/uptick/uptick/index.html /var/www/html/index.html
cp -R /var/www/projects/uptick/uptick/fonts/ /var/www/html/fonts
cp -R /var/www/projects/uptick/uptick/css/ /var/www/html/css
cp -R /var/www/projects/uptick/uptick/images/	/var/www/html/images
mkdir -p /var/www/html/js/
cp /var/www/projects/uptick/uptick/js/data.js /var/www/html/js/data.js

action_list.description: System action for installing an application

attrs.script:
yum -y install curl sudo
sudo yum -y install epel-release
#curl --silent --location https://rpm.nodesource.com/setup_8.x | sudo bash -
sudo yum -y install nodejs
#sudo yum -y install gcc-c++ make

setenforce 0
systemctl stop firewalld
yum -y update

mkdir -p /var/www/projects/uptick
cd /var/www/projects/uptick
yum -y install git
git clone https://github.com/mjastad/uptick.git

mv uptick/* .
